name: Crime City PD
description:
Crime City has been taken over by ruthless and powerful gangs! Crime is out of control. In a last-ditch effort, the mayor has appointed you as the new police chief. You must lead the loyal police officers of Crime City and bring down the gangs.

Features

  • Intense real-time strategy gameplay;
  • Procedurally-generated city: every game is different;
  • Collect clues and use deductive reasoning to figure out the gang hideouts;

This game was created as my January submission for the One Game a Month Game Jam. As a game jam game, it contains some known bugs and is not as complete as I would have liked. But, if you like the game let me know in the comments below. If there is enough interest, I might be able to find the time to revisit this game and polish it off.
